Class FESI.ClassFile.EventAdaptorClassFile 

FESI.ClassFile.EventAdaptorClassFile
public final class EventAdaptorClassFile

This class is used by the EventAdaptorGenerator to author the implementation of the EventAdaptor classes that it is responsible for generating and loading.

This class wraps all the ClassFile generic support classes and provides the adaptor specific implemenetation.

See Also:
EventAdaptorGenerator

EventAdaptorClassFile(String, OutputStream)

This statis function creates the class file implementation and writes it to the stream for loading ...

EventAdaptorClassFile 
 public EventAdaptorClassFile(String className,
                              OutputStream os) throws IOException, ClassNotFoundException

This statis function creates the class file implementation and writes it to the stream for loading ...

Parameters:
className - the name of the adaptor class to synthesize.
os - the stream to write the class file into
Returns:
s
Throws: IOException
If any IO error occured during class loading
Throws: ClassNotFoundException
If the class could not be loaded
